A. The soundtrack of 'Ludo' has more exposure than typical film soundtracks.
B. The soundtrack of 'Ludo' is expected to have similar exposure to that of theatrically-released films.
C. Unlike the soundtracks to theatrically-released films, the album will not have exposure to the audiences.
D. The soundtrack of 'Ludo' will be widely promoted in theaters.
Correct Answer: Unlike the soundtracks to theatrically-released films, the album will not have exposure to the audiences.
